overview: Alexis is a middle aged man with a good job,a beautiful wife and everything seems to be fine for him. However,one day he loses his job and his wife is about to leave him. He will search for a new female in order to fill the void in his life. Some young and beautiful women will show a sudden interest in him and he will not know how to react. A series of weird events will take place in his life.
title: Women's Conspiracies
